widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: Justia Contributing to Google Tag Manager Templates Gallery:
config.description: We started contributing with templates to the Google Tag Manager community gallery. Go to this page and type in "Justia" in the search box.

config.title: Justia Lawyer Directory Data Update:
config.description: We completed the first round of significant updates to our Lawyer Directory by updating the information on more than 600K profiles. This will make it easier for lawyers to claim their JLD profiles.

config.title: Content for Justia Lawyer Directory (Top Practice Area Pages):
config.description: All of the top-level practice area pages have dedicated content now.

config.title: Visual Regression QA:
config.description: Keeping up with our quality assurance efforts, we implemented a visual regression testing tool to monitor any visual changes to our Justia properties. The new implementation will help us reduce the time spent monitoring whenever there's a change to our traditional Justia look and feel.

config.title: 2020 State Codes:
config.description: We started our yearly State Codes by pushing the first updated state of the year live: 2020 Arizona Revised Statutes. Also, new team members who joined the Engineering Team within the last month are helping this time.

config.title: Google My Business (Malicious Updates Detection):
config.description: We are committed to guarding the integrity of the information in our clients' GMB listings by keeping track of any edits to their location name and bringing it back to their correct value. This is a new feature in the SEO Tool.

config.title: Infrastructure and Server Maintenance:
config.description: As usual, we keep performing maintenance to our server infrastructure regularly. We continue with updates to our databases by covering the Ask a Lawyer DB and others supporting our clients' and Justia friends' properties. We also performed an upgrade to our HelpDesk system.
